comments.commentBody: McCarthyism? Trump ought to know. His former attorney Roy Cohn worked for old Senator Joe; and Cohn tought our glorious leader how to light stinkbombs as diversions. This time Trump's Molotov cocktail is a cover for his Russian ties. It's ironic that this time, the Red scare is real for our democracy.

Trump needs an intervention for his psychos, just  keep pressing DT. "O" can get the job done, just keep it up. The arrogance of ignorance is a threat to our Democracy and there are many, at top levels, including former Presidents who will pull your plug.

Lance Dodes, retired professsor of psychiatry, Harvard Medical School, has submitted a letter, Feb. 13, to the Editors of the NYT and signed by 35 other psychiatrists stating Trump's unsuitability for the Presidency due to serious mental issues. I would think that the CIA or related would be responsible for pursuing this. Not sure if the government is actually functional at this stage. Dodes letter is on line.
He's just going back to his old schtick. Kenyan Obama illegitimate president has the gall to be the head of a government thats investigating me.

You need to read what many say -- the gist of it is that he has not yet shown any clear evidence of harming himself; they do not deny he harms everyone around him.

but I think that the evidence that Trump is harming himself is in front of us all, it's obvious. He is generating enemies at a rate never seen before in American history. He's certain to go down in history as a bone-headed neo-fascist disaster, embarrassment to all of America. That's a form of self-mutilation, but he can't help himself.
For God's sake, step down!! For your own health and the good of the country. This has gone on far too long. #ResignOrBeImpeached
Thanks, Peak. That's reassuring. I get carried away.

Fox is reporting that there was an authorized wiretap of Trump's offices during the election because of Russian interference issues.  Does Mr. Trump not know the difference between a lawfully obtained wiretap  by the FBI or another law enforcement agency and one ordered by President Obama himself?  Or is he cynically trying to manipulate his followers to believe that President Obama was out to get him?  Either way, this is further evidence of his mental unfitness to occupy the Oval Office.
Just as Mr. Trump beckoned the Russians to find  Sec. Clinton's missing emails, we should beckon them to find the missing phone transcripts.

What amazes me - is that no hacker or group have tried to hack and release Trump's tax return(s). That's Trump's Achilles heel.It'so obvious why he won't.
Plus I cannot believe that the IRS has extraordinary computer defenses like the DOD or State Dept.
If and when they come out - the old tree - rotten on the inside will fall with a huge thud.
Trump is wearing thin.

If the press only printed 45's statements that could be verified as the truth, we wouldn't ever see his name.

Don't help spread his lies. Hold his feet to the fire if you are going to devote your entire press to him.
This is the Really Big Lie. Those of us who care for our democracy, of whatever party or political persuasion, must gear up to fight this to the bitter end,.

It's claimed that Mr. Trump doesn't drink alcohol, but these Twitter rants have the marks of an uninhibited, lonely, drunk, crying out incoherently.  Are we sure that Mr. Trump doesn't drink heavily when he's all alone?
He also doesn't sleep.  And is behaving as erratically as if he has had no sleep.
Maybe he should have a drink now and then.  Never trust a teetotaler,  I say.

President Obama has put up with a lot from this guy -- from the "birther" baloney to this wiretap fiction. This guy will not stop lying until it costs him money which is the only thing he really cares about except his hair.

President Obama, this guy just implied that you are now a felon. It's about time you sued Mr. Trump for libel.

1,236 comments --- all triggered by a moronic tweet. Just think about the wasted time and energy that this foolish president costs America! my god, we'll be lucky if we can get out of 4 years without something catastrophic happening. such an inept person with millions and millions of votes?! What were these people thinking?! It just baffles me. I.  Just. Don't. Understand.

Unfettered gun (lack of) control and abortion restrictions/prohibition. Voting to preserve the GOP/ conservative positions on gun rights and abortion restrictions.  Trump isn't even a GOP politician if you ask me, but he was the GOP pick, so that's that.

I never actually had a chemistry class when I was in school, and I am always at sea when the XWP depends on the Periodic Table, which I only know has some pretty colors. But in this case I did get the theme pretty much instantly, and I did know the [circled letters] and their meanings, so it was okay.

I still don't quite get the clue for ACE, even after Deb's explanation. Why hearts?

[Chocolate-and-banana liquer cocktail]/CAPRI????? Well, at least if I ever see CAPRI on a menu I will be forewarned. Sounds absolutely vile!

Didn't know BETHEL was specific to seamen.

Overall, nice themers, and some lively cluing.

Thanks to all.

Sometimes I take so long composing (plus waiting for the emus to make sure I haven't been naughty) that other replies get in ahead of mine. As for the CAPRI, never heard of it but I actually think it looks good for a drink I would never order. White crème de cacao (not brown!), crème de bananes, light cream (we use half & half) - would produce a pale yellow, frothy concoction (similar to my "Mellow Yellow" invention which does well with the ladies).  Saving it to my "drink ideas" list for early spring.

Dr W,
If you click on SEE ALL REPLIES *before* opening the little window you type in, you should see all posted replies, in order.

I think we've all had the experience of submitting a reply (or a comment) before a similar one has posted.  Sometimes two great minds are thinking alike simultaneously, I think, and other times there are emu-caused delays.  Lots of stuff is out of order.
All these people who don't like or understand science could put their tin foil hats in the microwave!

Modo is right about W and "Mission Accomplished" AND "Crazy Trump."

So why did she try to convince everyone that there was something wrong with "Barry's" Presidency and demeaned Hillary's campaign run?

Although I was a fan of Trump's "Apprentice" and feel bittersweet about its demise 13 years later, I refuse to watch any more of his speeches. There's nothing that he's going to say that I haven't already seen displayed on the Apprentice or in 2 years of campaign rallies and debates, all of which I watched.

Van Jones is delusional if he thinks that Trump became President at that moment. You don't become President then and then tweet about Schumer eating donuts with Putin, Arnold's Apprentice ratings and Obama wiretapping all within the next few days following that speech.

Give me a break. I got upset that the media got so inspired by a speech. Speeches don't mean much to me. Actions do. Even Obama's speeches. Big whoop. It's his accomplishments that are impressive.

But back to W. I'm not a fan but am a former New Yorker and a coworker died in the trade center that day. We needed W's Bullhorn Moment. We needed that badly and you know what? For that moment, he did become President. Trump's plea for a standing ovation is not the same.
The intelligence community thought otherwise with respect to Russia. Trump can deny all he wants, but it's starting to become clear that there is quite a bit of fire behind the smoke.
All these tweets about "wire tapping" just go to show how sick this so-called president is. If he cannot stand the heat, he should get out of the kitchen.

Very slow start for me, although I was pleased to remember SHIRLEYCHISHOLM. But a few things here and there opened up the floodgates, and I finished in less time than usual for a Saturday. Well, except for the Natick of SCUT/NEUER, I figured SCAT could be reasonable for 51D and never bothered to revisit the square. Can I claim ITSNOTFAIR?

Loved the long downs. Don't know SPORCLE, will check it out.

The recently and too-soon departed George Michael, with his immortal #1 smash "FAITH" from 1987:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lu3VTngm1F0

Keep focus on the core problems: Russia and his tax returns; and the financial profits he and family get from the presidency despite of their claims otherwise.
These claims represent yet another attempt to distract attention.

As the Trump administration continues to demonstrate just how unstable it is, I wonder if he and his staff are still being briefed on sensitive national security issues? And if they are, is this in the best interest of our nation and its' citizens?

trump can't even seem to form a real government. he isn't working on legislation to put his promises into practice and he's farmed out foreign policy to jared kushner. we're indulging ourselves in a little experiment in federal anarchy. nobody is in charge.

The states are in charge and the military.
Washington is decompressing and decompensating.
They all need Risperadal ASAP and ELectroshock therapy.
Are we living in " Clockwork Orange". ?
Is this the Twilight Zone?

"The real question is whether this would be proper."

When Trump produces some proof it actually happened in the real universe, I'll care whether or not it's proper.
